channel.title: captcha on S.R.A
channel.description: Recent content in captcha on S.R.A

item.title: Cracking Captcha using Deep Learning
item.description: Research The goal of this project is to explore deep learning by figuring out how to crack captcha. Procedure Use the following python code to create about 50,000 Captcha : import random import numpy as np import string from captcha.image import ImageCaptcha image = ImageCaptcha() clist = list(string.ascii_uppercase+string.digits) random.shuffle(clist) labels = [] for j in range(50000): randstr = '' for i in range(4): randstr = randstr + random.choice(clist) labels.append(randstr) data = image.
